trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem"></xref> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> changes.

A StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs specifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to use to draw the panel, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> object in which to draw the panel, the panel identification number, state information about the panel, and the panel to draw.

You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event to create custom-drawn panels in your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class without specifying a background and foreground color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to render text.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the client area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> values that represents state information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> that represents the panel to draw.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs"></xref> class with a specified background and foreground color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to render text.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the client area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState"></xref> values that represents state information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> that represents the panel to draw.
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> values that represents the foreground color of the panel to draw.
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> values that represents the background color of the panel to draw.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> to draw.
The Panel property enables you to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that needs to be drawn.

You can use this information within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> to draw.
